title: Smells like a new book
author: VD
content_html: I just received word today from a publisher that they have decided to publish my next book. It’s too soon to say anything official about it, but if you think about it, you’ll probably be able to figure out the subject matter.
content_text: I just received word today from a publisher that they have decided to publish my next book.  It’s too soon to say anything official about it, but if you think about it, you’ll probably be able to figure out the subject matter.
